featured.text: Instead of a gift, Tim’s grandmother always _____
Out of and consideration, I always write a thank-you note when someone sends me a gift.
But __16__ that Christmas is just a few weeks away, __17__ is a gift idea.
Salesmen expect digital cameras to be popular gifts this holiday season.
A word of congratulation just doesn't seem enough, so I am sending you a gift that I'm sure you will find.

definition.zh_def: 贈送的物品，通常用於表達感謝、祝賀或愛意。
definition.en_def: A thing given willingly to someone without payment; a present.
definition.example: She received a beautiful gift for her birthday.
